metadata.othernotes: i might drop dead of a brain aneurism if i use the character editor any longer

case.name: CATS' Job Offer.
case.description: CATS has noticed someone at the table doesn't respect the law, and has offered them an opportunity to join his space pirate crew.

case.name: CATS Teleports Away.
case.description: Instead of forfeiting, CATS has just teleported away!

case.name: How are you?
case.description: CATS rhetorically asks how the people at the table are doing. If your character isn't too socially adept, they could reply genuinely.

case.name: Police detected.
case.description: CATS is surprised at the presence of police/military figures at the table.

notes.note: translator's note: i dont fucking know what this means either lol
real line from the real release. what the fuck.

markers.marker: counts how many times the player has defeated CATS (hopefully!)
